sourcesContent:
import './index.css' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { RootState } from '../../redux/store' // Actions import { getProductDetails } from '../../redux/actions/productActions' import { addToCart } from '../../redux/actions/cartActions' const ProductScreen = ({ match, history }: { match: any, history: any }) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(1) const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector((state: RootState) => state.getProductDetails) const { loading, error, product }: { loading: any, error: any, product: any } = productDetails useEffect(() => { if (product && match.params.id !== product._id) { dispatch(getProductDetails(match.params.id)) } }, [dispatch, product, match]) return (
{loading ? (

Loading...

) : error ? (

{error}

) : ( <>

{product.name}

價格：${product.price} NT

{product.description}

價格： ${product.price} NT

狀態：{" "} {product.countInStock > 0 ? "有現貨" : "已售完"}

數量

) }
) } export default ProductScreen
